title: Broken Lullabies
description: How far will one woman go for her baby? For the past six years Macie Jennings has been telling anyone who would listen that her older sister didn't die of an overdose, she was murdered. Now that Macie is pregnant she knows if she doesn't get out of town fast there's a good chance she will suffer the same fate. High School counselor Cammy Hart is finally going to start her family. She has a new job, her husband is coming home from war, and she's pregnant. Then she meets Macie. The closer Cammy gets to Macie the more her life begins to unravel. She discovers a murdered school bus driver was a pedophile hired at the demand of the All- Powerful Motorcycle Gang, she's attacked in her apartment complex, in a struggle with the small town Sheriff who isn't quite on the up and up, and soon finds herself as the main suspect when someone is murdered on school grounds. Broken Lullabies is a race against time, and the nine month clock is ticking.
author: Ryan T. Smith
